pages.text: The $(mob)Oni$() is a monster that spawns in Taigas of the $(thing)Overworld$() at night. It attacks players on sight by attempting to get into melee, inflicting $(thing)Slowness$() on hit. When reduced below 25%, $(mob)Oni$() gain a $(thing)Strength$() potion effect.
$(mob)Oni$() drop $(item)Soul Fire$() on death. These are an excellent source of fuel and burn for 580 seconds. Can also be used like $(item)Flint and Steel$() to start fires.

$(mob)Oni$() drop $(item)Iron Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while in hand to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of iron. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Small)$().
